阿里通义实验室开源的WebAgent第四弹：WebShaper，GAIA评测超过Claude4-Sonnet、GPT-4.1

WebShaper是一个基于信息检索任务的数据集生成新框架，核心是其从“信息驱动”转向“形式化驱动”的新范式

以解决信息驱动方法的信息结构与推理逻辑错位、信息覆盖有限问题，让AI能够解决更复杂开放性的任务 https://t.co/LJGWc6RCLV

fullText: One view is AI causes the cost of building software to compete with incumbents to go down. But the incumbents will benefit from more output and enter more spaces. Initially this seems like a race to the bottom, except there’s so much more software to be built in the world.
